name: Bitsy3D+Twine Project: My Own Private Lospass
name_original: Bitsy3D+Twine Project: My Own Private Lospass
description:
A personal game-as-essay about Flower, Sun and Rain; about Hawaii; about mental health.

Made for a course, using Bitsy and Twine.

CW: talk of suicidal ideation.

Made using https://communistsister.itch.io/twitsy-template-1, https://aloelazoe.itch.io/bitsy-3d, and https://github.com/seleb/bitsy-hacks.
